diffuse

diffuse

Properties

gdouble scale Read / Write

Types and Values

struct GstDiffuse

Object Hierarchy

    GObject
    ╰── GInitiallyUnowned
        ╰── GstObject
            ╰── GstElement
                ╰── GstBaseTransform
                    ╰── GstVideoFilter
                        ╰── GstGeometricTransform
                            ╰── GstDiffuse

Description

Diffuse is a geometric image transform element. It diffuses the image by moving its pixels in random directions.

Example launch line

1
 
gst-launch-1.0 -v videotestsrc ! diffuse ! videoconvert ! autovideosink

Property Details

The “scale” property

  “scale”                    gdouble

Scale of the texture.

Flags: Read / Write

Allowed values: >= 1

Default value: 4
